  • Classes in com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl used by com.flowpowered.caustic.api 
    Class and Description
    Context
    Represents an OpenGL context.
    Context.BlendFunction
    An enum of the blending functions.
    Context.Capability
    An enum of the renderer capabilities.
    FrameBuffer
    Represents an OpenGL frame buffer.
    Program
    Represents an OpenGL program.
    Texture
    Represents a texture for OpenGL.

    An enum of the blending functions.

    An enum of the renderer capabilities.

    Represents an OpenGL frame buffer.
    FrameBuffer.AttachmentPoint
    An enum of the possible frame buffer attachment points.

    Represents an OpenGL program.
    RenderBuffer
    Represents an OpenGL render buffer.
    Shader
    Represents an OpenGL shader.
    Shader.ShaderType
    Represents a shader type.
    Texture
    Represents a texture for OpenGL.
    Texture.CompareMode 
    Texture.FilterMode
    An enum for the texture filtering modes.
    Texture.Format
    An enum of texture component formats.
    Texture.InternalFormat
    An enum of sized texture component formats.
    Texture.WrapMode
    An enum for the texture wrapping modes.
    VertexArray
    Represent an OpenGL vertex array.
    VertexArray.DrawingMode
    Represents the different drawing modes for the vertex array
    VertexArray.PolygonMode
    Represents the different polygon modes for the vertex array
